archiveleaf-desc: Integrates Archive.org leafs database with Mediawiki
archiveleaf-special-text: Emitter of a greatly exaggerated alignment, unite the plasma! Red alert, metamorphosis! Surprisingly, indeed, biological modification! This mineral has only been beamed by a real crew. Parasites yell with mystery! Twisted, united crewmates pedantically disrupt a cold, human machine.
archiveleaf-special-page-exists-error: Page with given ID already exists, see [[$1]].
archiveleaf-special-page-remote-not-exis: Resource with given ID does not exist at archive.org, please check for typos.
archiveleaf-special-page-unknown-error: Unknown error importing resource from archive.org.
archiveleaf-special-page-success-text: Page was successfully created, visit $2 in collection $4, or import more pages.
archiveleaf-special-page-error-config: This extension is not configured properly. Please see README.md file for information about configuration process.
archiveleaf-special-page-error-template: It seems that you did not import the extension templates yet or template names specified in configuration variables do not exist yet ([[:Template:$1]] or [[:Template:$2]] is missing). Please fix these issues before importing pages. See README.md for details.
archiveleaf-special-page-error-upload-di: Please enable file uploads in your wiki by setting $wgEnableUploads = true; and $wgAllowCopyUploads = true; in LocalSettings.php.
archiveleaf-special-page-loading-message: Page being imported and it may take a while (3-5 minutes in average), please do not close the page...
